meanings.definition: A device or piece of equipment designed to perform a specific task, typically a household task.
meanings.sent1: In the kitchen, we use appliances like the microwave and toaster to cook food.
meanings.sent2: Modern homes are equipped with various appliances such as refrigerators and washing machines.
meanings.sent3: The appliances in the house decided to have a dance party while we were away.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an appliance, always ready to whip up new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The appliances hummed in harmony, creating a symphony of convenience.

meanings.definition: The action or process of applying a piece of equipment or device for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The proper use of appliances can make household chores much easier.
meanings.sent2: Learning how to control the appliances in the lab is an important part of the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The appliances of knowledge were put to the test during the science fair.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an appliance, applying itself to every challenge that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The appliances of progress worked tirelessly to improve the quality of life for all.
